title: Sexy Nights of the Living Dead (1980)
description:
Original title:Le notti erotiche dei morti viventi ()
Director: Joe D'Amato
Writer: George Eastman (as Tom Salina)
Stars: Laura Gemser, George Eastman, Dirce Funari |
Storyline:
A sailor takes an American businessman and his girlfriend to an island where the businessman wants to build a resort. Soon a weird voodoo couple show up and warn them of bad things that are going to happen. It doesn't take long for the zombies to show up and start chowing down on human flesh. The main characters do manage to fit in quite a bit of sex though. Written by Josh Pasnak
Plot Keywords: island | human flesh | sex | living dead | fellatio
Genres: Horror | Adult
Certificate: Unrated
Country: Italy
Language:English
Subtitles: multi subs
Runtime:01:51:45
Screenshots:

Release Date: 18 November 1980 (Italy)
Also Known As: Erotic Nights of the Living Dead
Filming Locations: Cine International, Rome, Lazio, Italy
